name: Fearsome Flip
description: This spicy and rich cocktail recipe uses Trader Tiki's newest cocktail ingredient, Hazelnut Orgeat, which is a filbert-based syrup made from roasted hazelnuts grown Oregon.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients except nutmeg to a cocktail shaker. Shake without ice for fifteen seconds. Fill shaker with ice and shake for thirty seconds.
Strain into a coupe glass, grate nutmeg on top and serve immediately.
